Object.Description: A short sword crafted from oak wood. Suitable for training.
An iron forged short sword.
A broad-bladed bronze sword.
A well-made steel sword with a broad blade.
An exceptional steel sword plated with gold.
A great sword forged from a mystical alloy.
A magnificent piece of craftsmanship, cast from powerful adamantite.
An elegant emerald blade, crafted to skilled champions as a sign of their combat prowess.
A gleaming amethyst cut sword of divine power, gifted by the kingdom to the most powerful warriors as an ultimate sign of their mastery.
A simple wooden wand with a basic crystal set on top. Suitable for training.
A wand that emits bolts of pure force.
A wand that fires power bolts.
A wand that shoots dark eldritch energy.
A wand that casts a powerful missile.
A wand capable of firing potent ice spells.
A crimson wand capable of firing devastating bolts of dark energy.
A magnificent wand enchanted by the higher priests as a weapon to wreak justice on evil doers.
A simple wooden bow. Suitable for training.
A shortbow made with quality wood.
A shortbow plated with bronze.
A quality bow reinforced with iron plating.
A high-quality bow plated with gold.
A quality long bow reinforced with a mystical alloy. It fires in two different directions.
A magnificent longbow reinforced with beautiful rubies. It can now fire in three directions at once.
A bow crafted from the finest wood in the kingdom and reinforced with gold and emeralds, gifted to the most skilled archers.
A holy bow crafted with the finest wood and set with the highest quality amethysts in the kingdom, gifted to the most skilled archers as an ultimate sign of their marksmanship.
A short wooden dagger. Suitable for training.
A short iron blade mounted on a dagger hilt.
A dagger made of bronze.
A sharp dirk made out of quality steel.
A gold-plated steel dagger.
A well-made dagger crafted with a mystical alloy.
A dagger plated with finest rubies in the kingdom.
An extremely sharp dagger plated with emeralds as a gift to the kingdom's skilled assassins.
A holy dirk plated with enchanted amethysts gifted by the kingdom to the most notable slayers as a signal of their furtive prowess.
A wooden staff topped with a simple crystal. Suitable for training.
A staff charged with the icy powers of the heavens.
A staff that harnesses the energy of shooting stars.
A staff powered by the magic of Stheno's minions.
A golden staff pulsing with auras of vengeance and justice.
A powerful staff charged with devastating frozen energy.
A golden staff set with a ruby crystal, pulsating with evil magic.
A glorious staff topped with an enchanted emerald, serving as a symbol of great sorcery.
A divine staff filled with divine destructive magic, crafted as a gift to the most powerful mages in the kingdom.
A wooden stick, suitable for training.
A basic katana made of iron,
A basic katana.
A striking fine-edged weapon.
A katana capable of cutting a razor-thin line.
An ancient katana forged of a mystical alloy.
A crimson katana enchanted with demonic energy..
A royal weapon cut from a single emerald, gifted to the most skilled ninjas as reward for their unrivaled prowess.
A holy weapon enchanted with divine energy, gifted by the kingdom to the most powerful samurai as the ultimate sign of their mastery.
A basic plate made out of hardened leather. Suitable for training
Armor made from interlocking links of metal.
A chestplate made of solid bronze.
Well-made chestplate plated with silver.
Well-made chestplate plated with gold, clearly intended for the use of a great lord.
An excellent piece of armor crafted from a mystical alloy.
A chestplate crafted from the scales of a slain dragon.
Royal armor used by the kingdom's infantry guards.
Holy chestplate cut from a single amethyst stone, serving as a true symbol of resistance.
A basic hide made of cured leather. Suitable for training.
Leather armor made from the skin of a magical lizard.
Armor made from the thick leather of a dire bear.
Leather armor reinforced with metal rivets for extra protection
A well made hide reinforced with golden rivets.
A tough hide reinforced with rivets of a mystical alloy.
Tough, durable armor made from wyvern leather.
Royal hide used by the kingdom's artillery bands.
Holy leather studded with enchanted amethyst gems, serving as a true symbol of swiftness.
A simple robe woven with simple cloth. Suitable for training.
A robe woven of rare silver silk.
A well-made robe of enchanted gold silk.
A magical robe of grey moonsilk.
A magical robe of faintly glowing wizardcloth.
An enchanted robe of dark moonweave.
A powerful robe of delicately embroidered red feythread.
Royal robe used by the kingdom's support bands.
A robe woven from holy cloth and enchantd amethyst gems, a true symbol of sorcery.
A simple band made of treated wood. Suitable for training.
A simple band made out of iron.
A simple band made out of bronze with a crystal set on top.
A simple band made out of silver with a crystal set on top.
A simple band made out of gold with a crystal set on top.
A sapphire set on an exquisite golden band.
A ruby set on an exquisite golden band.
A perfectly cut emerald set on an exquisite golden band.
A stunningly beautiful amethyst set on an exquisite golden band.
A helm made with sturdy wood. Suitable for training.
A sturdy helm used by battlefield sergeants to improve morale in nearby allies.
A bronze-plated lieutenant's helm, effective for invigorating the fighting spirit of nearby allies.
A well-made commander's helm of steel with silver filigree, able to inspire gallantry in large numbers of troops.
A golden field marshal's helm with platinum detailing, able to motivate entire legions to new heights of tenacity and determination.
A helm crafted with a mystical alloy, capable of arousing fearlessness and courage among the troops.
A steel and platinum helm of ancient design, worn by earthrazer generals during the great orcish war.
A royal helm of ancient design, worn by the highest ranks among the kingdom's military.
An ashen helm of regal grandeur, whose wearers have upraised the greatest legions and inspired total domination.
A shield made of sturdy wood. Suitable for training.
A shield made of well forged iron.
A shield made of high quality bronze.
A steel shield supported by iron ribbing.
An ornate but strong shield plated with gold.
A very strong shield made from a mystical alloy.
A superior shield forged in deep armories for the construct armies of the underworld.
A mighty shield smithed in the burning rivers of the demonic realms to grant the right of sovereignty over the brutal Orclands.
A holy shield forged by the heavens to protect mortals from evil.
A cloak woven from basic cloth. Suitable for training.
A magical cloak, made for slipping into shadows undetected.
An enchanted cloak steeped in magical darkness.
A mystical grey cloak once used by blackguard tricksters for flanking maneuvers and sneak attacks.
An exceptional cloak used by sorcerer-thieves for night operations in dockyards and storehouses.
A powerful cloak woven from the shadows of twilight.
A powerful cloak used by master spies to infiltrate the most tightly guarded fortresses.
An eldritch cloak of the afterworld which grants invisibility by enveloping its user in death itself.
A moonwoven cloak worn by slayer cults who spill the blood of emperors in their abhorrent mission to create a new order.
A simple vial filled with muddy water. Suitable for training.
Deadly poison of the swamp centipede.
Magically concentrated venom of the carnivorous leaping tree spider.
Deadly magical poison taken from the two headed pit snakes of the underworld.
Lethal aquatic poison extracted from the glands of the magical demon ray.
Magically refined poison of the rare and dangerous felwasp.
Magically enhanced venom of the savage nightwing dragon.
Concentrated, lethal venom of the winged ethereal baneserpent.
The oceanic Necrofish's highly noxious poisons, secreted from its spines to befoul entire swaths of the seas.
A simple tome with a leather cover. Suitable for training.
A holy tome of healing prayers.
A hallowed tome of blessed healing rituals.
An exalted holy tome, filled with prayers and blessed by angels.
A sacred tome, consecrated by the spirits of the upright and the supplications of the pure.
An angelic tome, empowered by divine might and justified by the souls of the righteous.
A sanctified tome, blessed by the heavens and purified by ancient rites, trembling with unseen divine power.
A tome of blessing, gifted by the gods for the benefit of all good mortals.
A tome beatified in starlight and written on paper from the ancient wisdom trees, cloaking the worthy in divine reverence.
A basic wooden seal. Suitable for training.
A holy seal of divine favor.
A seal of holy providence and mortal virtue.
A holy seal of godly protection, shimmering with divine might.
A seal of blessed preservation, gleaming with the sacred will of the righteous
A consecrated seal of the heavens, able to quickly heal large numbers of allies.
A hallowed seal of the immortal divine, able to heal and inspire great numbers of crusading warriors.
A holy seal of heavenly omnipotence, given to aid mortal warriors in their fight against chaos and darkness.
A jubilant seal of celebration, granted to the most righteous crusaders as they challenge the evergrowing threat of demonic legions.
A basic quiver made of cured leather. Suitable for training.
A strong quiver of magical iron.
An enchanted quiver made of high-quality leather and brass.
A powerful enchanting quiver made by forest elves.
A quiver that shines with gold and pulses with the power of elvish archer spirits.
A quiver reinforced with a mystical alloy.
A quiver enchanted with blood magic, said to have been once owned by a corrupted elf.
A forestcloth quiver of highest quality, exhibiting exceptional magic powers and used by the foremost masters of Elven archery.
A sun iron quiver passed through a royal elven lineage, whose legendary skills in archery have protected the Forest Kingdoms for millennia.
A simple wooden tablet for basic spell casting. Suitable for training.
A spell that shoots fire in all directions.
A dangerous spell that summons green fire from the astral plane.
A deadly spell created by goblin sorcerers to subdue their orcish enemies.
A formidable fire spell used by dwarven magi in their war against the trolls.
An immensely powerful spell created by the wizard lords of the underworld to harness dark energies
An unimaginably destructive spell, devised by the great mountain thaumaturgists to battle against demonic giants.
A horrifically dangerous spell, formulated in the elemental planes during the great astral wars.
A catastrophic spell of holy destruction, concocted in secrecy by the Liturgical Ones in their quest to learn a single letter of the divine language.
A basic wooden star. Suitable for training.
A ninja-star with four razor-sharp points.
A ninja-star with curved spiraling blades.
A beautifully crafted shuriken.
A powerful gold plated shuriken.
A shuriken formed from a mystical alloy.
A royal shuriken used by the samurai leaders of an old empire.
A heraldic shuriken of the ancient royal family, revered for its astonishingly lethal edge after generations of use by a mighty eastern empire.
A simple wooden scepter with a basic crystal. Suitable for training.
A scepter that fires a blast of chain lightning.
A bronze scepter that blasts electrical arcs
A powerful scepter imbued with the energy of astral storms.
A glittering golden scepter charged with magical lightning.
A azure scepter of power, created by storm giants during their long war against the undertrolls.
A commanding scepter of authority, wielded by cloud titan nobles from the elemental plane of air.
An azure scepter of elemental dominion, wielded by the sky charioteers to command the natural order of the overlands and the orchestration of astral bodies.
A human skull corrupted with life-stealing necrotic magic.
A dwarven skull desecrated by foul enchantments.
An elvish wizard's skull, defiled with life-stealing necrotic spells.
A holy paladin's skull, fouled by depraved incantations of necromancy.
A lesser demon's skull, empowered and amplified by dark enchantments of the underworld.
A powerful demon skull permeated with unspeakably horrific sorceries.
The skull of a vampire lord, further desecrated with the depraved magics of soul thievery.
The skull of a vampire lord, further desecrated with the depraved magics of soul thievery.
The skull of a vampire lord, further desecrated with the depraved magics of soul thievery.

A potion that instantly restores health points.
A potion that instantly restores magic points.

Restore 20% of your main ability's cooldown
Restore 20% of your main ability's cooldown
